name: Indie Dream
detailed_description:
Summary

This is a story about a young and naive indie developer.

The protagonist is a person who have a dream of publishing his own game. Just like many other newbee developers, he tries to master those skills needed for developing. In addition, he will need to figure out how the world of gamers works.
Is him simple and naive enough to have an indie dream?

Game

This is a story game. Your main goal is to develop indie games inside this indie game. The protagonist’s experience will be revealed within the combination of story-telling and interactive minigames.

Features

  • Act as an indie developer.
  • Simulate the process of developing with interactions and minigames.
  • Wandering and wondering, pushing forward.
  • Some parts of the story are based on personal experiences.

Other

This is a personal game. The problems and difficulties encountered during developing this game are also a part of the game itself.

Somehow, the game is very ME. But in another way, it is not ME anymore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 7,8,10
  • Processor: 2 GHZ
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
